ack.p: The authors gratefully acknowledge the contributions and cooperation by the Medford District Bureau of Land Management, especially Bryan Wender and Mark Mousseaux, who compiled database records for the species regionally. Support was also provided the Rogue-Siskiyou National Forest and facilitated by Wayne Rolle and Barb Mumblo. Staff of the Institute for Applied Ecology assisted with this project, including Carolyn Menke who made the maps used in this paper, and Amanda Stanley and Heather Root who provided statistical support. We thank three anonymous reviewers for comments and suggestions that improved this paper.
